data.event: The town's most prosperous days are considered to be the years prior to World War I.

event.title: 1825, the advent of steel-hulled ships, and perhaps over-cutting of White Pine, contributed

data.event: The Great Miramichi Fire of 1825, the advent of steel-hulled ships, and perhaps over-cutting of White Pine, contributed to a long-term decline in the town's econonomy.
